author: abdoulline
body:
#### PR description:

Needed in the context of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43025
to use Conditions for all the eras,  including Phase2 

#### PR validation:

(1) dump of the relevant HcalPFCutsRcd from the Event for Phase2 with aging 1000/fb 
     shows expected (= configurables) HB numbers 

(2) runTheMatrix.py -l limited --ibeos --useInput all
title: HCAL: setting hardcoded PFCuts conditions for Phase2
